text: geuleomeulo seodulleo junimkke yong seoleul guhago seodulleo cheongug-eulo deul la geugos-eun haneulgwa daejiui neolb-ilo ineun hananimgwa geubun-ui seonjijaleul midneun jadeul-eul wihae junbidoen gos-imyeo hananim-ui eunhyega issneun gos-ila geu bun-eun geubun-i wonhaneun ja-ege geugeos eul bepusinani hananim-eun widaehan eunhyeui junim-isila
